message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm eager to make a deal, $12,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $12,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
